div.p: HALE CENTER ISD --- ACCOUNTABILITY RATING (B) --- FIRST RATING (A SUPERIOR) --- ACCREDITATION STATUS --- ACCREDITED

div.class: custom_151373 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12

p.span: From the office of Superintendent, Steven Pyburn

Governor Abbot announced today that school buildings will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to conduct distance learning, as we are doing now, for the remainder of the school year.
Hale Center ISD is awaiting additional guidance from TEA Commissioner of Education Mike Morath on conducting graduation ceremonies.
We will continue to monitor and provide you information as soon as it is available.

div.class: custom_151354 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12

em.span: If you need to enroll or withdraw your student please contact the campus secretaries though e-mail.
Akin Elementary contact Courtnei Garibay at cgaribay@hcisdowls.net
Carr Middle School contact Rosa Acevedo at racevedo@hcisdowls.net
Hale Center High School contact Linda Johnson at lijohnson@hcisdowls.net
If you have any questions, contact Monica Berry at 806-839-2451 extension 103 between 12:00 p.m. and 3:00 p.m.

div.class: custom_148879 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12

strong.span: Please follow the link below to explore National Parks, NASA, State of Texas and the White House – virtually:
